name: RONNARIUM
description:
An aquarium where a huge tank called "RONNARIUM" is on display.
There is a rumor that if one enters the aquarium at night, he or she will be "divinely bewitched".
A girl named "Yocto" hears the rumor and visits the aquarium to confirm the truth.

summary


It is a game to investigate and explore the aquarium.
Let's hear the truth of the rumor from the creatures and get the key to the room that will give you a clue.
This game is a "multi-end" where the outcome changes depending on your choices, and there are two endings.

Features


  • Dot-drawing 2D adventure game.
  • The story takes place in an aquarium.
  • Exploration extends to the back side of the aquarium.
  • Talk to the creatures and investigate the things that interest you as you move forward.
  • It is also possible to chat and interact with accompanying characters.
  • Basic operations are moving, examining (speaking).
  • Sometimes mystery solving and shooting elements?
  • 2 endings

Distribution Terms

.
You are welcome to distribute and post videos using footage from this game.
You are also welcome to monetize your work.
